line: Coming into the room, I see a strange glowing sphere laying on the bed.

speaker: Maid
line: "Did she manage to run off somewhere? And what's that ball?"
I come up to the bed and try to pick it up, but as soon as I touch it it absorbs into my body.

speaker: Maid
line: "Weird. Let's go get the thief, maybe we'll bump into her on the way."
